title: DungeonSoup
description: A full stack blog app of articles detailing tips and tricks for dungeon explorers, created with a RESTFUL API and SQL database, hosted with AWS Amplify and Render. Users can view a list of latest articles and read articles, search by article name, view author profiles and like/dislike articles.

title: Nindo Task
description: A full stack task management web app with a RESTful API and MongoDB database, built using Next.js and React. Features include task creation, editing, deletion, and real-time updates, with an intuitive UI and animations for enhanced user interaction.

title: Portfolio
description: A full stack portfolio app with a RESTful API, email submission form, and fully responsive design.
